title: Micro Controllers & Electronics
description: A collection of micro controller and electronics based projects done for a Computer Engineering Minor & Hobby

items.name: Medication Dispenser
items.description: In order to learn more about the Raspberry Pi Pico, as well as project planning with various electronics modules, I was able to build a medication dispenser with a team of four others in a Microcontrollers class. The project uses a Pico as the main brains of the system, a servo for dispensing medications, a buzzer, light, and display to output info about an onboard timer, and a few other modules for security and input. This project brought about a deeper understanding of working with individuals with different fields of study, and planning accordingly to harness the most of each members' strengths!

title: Metalworking & Fabrication
description: Focused fabrication using nonferrous metals to design various artistic sculptures and jewelry

items.name: Hollow Constructed Ring
items.description: A Brass & Silver Accented Ring using Hollow Construction for the ring body and bezel setting to set a cabochon of Lapis Lazuli

items.name: Die Formed Locket Pendant
items.description: A Copper Locket constructed from a Hydraulic Pressed Die Form of a Shield. Etched in Ferric Chloride, and finished with Liver of Sulfur & Buffing, this piece contains a single metal color, yet contrast through shapes and finishing.
